Name: White Paper
About the game: What is your subconscious trying to tell you when you are mindlessly drawing on a piece of paper at a boring meeting? Maybe someone locked up there in the dark damp basement of ida is screaming for help and trying to break out? Should I open this door or maybe hang a couple more locks on it? Another game from crazy indie experimenters from Dnovel studio! If, of course, it can be called a game... psychedelic visuals and philosophical reasoning. Is it possible to be yourself in a world of endless copies? - Minimalistic visual style - Mini-games in the genre of 'hidden object' - Reflections on the futility of being - Has the plastic world won?
